commands.name: az eventgrid namespace ca-certificate create
commands.syntax:
az eventgrid namespace ca-certificate create --ca-certificate-name
                                             --namespace-name
                                             --resource-group
                                             [--certificate]
                                             [--description]
                                             [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az eventgrid namespace ca-certificate create -g rg --namespace-name name -n certificate-name --description test --certificate file-path

commands.name: az eventgrid namespace ca-certificate delete
commands.syntax:
az eventgrid namespace ca-certificate delete [--ca-certificate-name]
                                             [--ids]
                                             [--namespace-name]
                                             [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                             [--resource-group]
                                             [--subscription]
                                             [--yes]
examples: az eventgrid namespace ca-certificate delete -g rg --namespace-name name -n certificate-name

commands.name: az eventgrid namespace ca-certificate list
commands.summary: List all the CA certificates under a namespace.
examples: az eventgrid namespace ca-certificate list -g rg --namespace-name name

commands.name: az eventgrid namespace ca-certificate show
examples: az eventgrid namespace ca-certificate show -g rg --namespace-name name -n certificate-name

commands.name: az eventgrid namespace ca-certificate update
commands.summary: Update a CA certificate with the specified parameters.
commands.syntax:
az eventgrid namespace ca-certificate update [--add]
                                             [--ca-certificate-name]
                                             [--certificate]
                                             [--description]
                                             [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                             [--ids]
                                             [--namespace-name]
                                             [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                             [--remove]
                                             [--resource-group]
                                             [--set]
                                             [--subscription]
examples: az eventgrid namespace ca-certificate update -g rg --namespace-name name -n certificate-name --description test

commands.name: az eventgrid namespace ca-certificate wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
